attributes.action: Restitution for victims of crime by the perpetrators.
attributes.background: Having seen the damage caused by people committing crime, I feel it is time they paid to have the physical damage they have caused. For example stolen cars crashing causes damage to both car and whatever they hit.  It is time that the law abiding stopped picking up the tab through higher insurance.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Courts are already able to order those convicted of crimes to pay compensation and/or a victim surcharge.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
